title: Executive Director of Chubani Company for the import of 300 Muslim refugees per month
subtitle: A misleading photo, McCroe, claimed that Chubani's CEO had pledged "to drown the United States with Muslims" and was "to import them to Idaho 300 simultaneously to work at his factory."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Executive Director of Chubani, Hamdi Olokaya, has pledged "to destroy the United States with Muslims," which is "to import them to Idaho 300 at once to work at his factory."
